NICKI MINAJ TRIVIA CHATBOT

Demoed at Snap Academy and approved by Evan Spiegel! This React Native app uses the ChatGPT Chat Completions API to prompt users with a string of emojis to use to guess a Nicki Minaj song title.

UNOFFICIAL SWEET BEAN WEBSITE

Built in one day for the Snap Academy application process. Prompted to build a demo website for a local business, I designed and implemented a webpage for Sweet Bean, a cafe near my house.
